about_the_game:
The 8th character to join the TFH roster is Texas the Bull, a big-body grappler who's smashing records on size and power!

Details

This DLC includes:
  • Additional Playable Character: "Texas"
  • New Stage: Caravan Cattledome (featuring fully dynamic music for all characters).
  • Texas Pixel Lobby Avatar

Note

  • This product is included in the Season 1 Pass. Be careful not to make duplicate purchases.
  • This item requires the base game (sold separately) to be used.
detailed_description:
The 8th character to join the TFH roster is Texas the Bull, a big-body grappler who's smashing records on size and power!

Details

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU (2 GHz or greater speed)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Core i3 550 Integrated graphics chipset or equivalent.
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU (2 GHz or greater speed)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: A dedicated GPU (Nvidia or AMD) with at least 750MB of VRAM strongly recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU (2 GHz or greater speed)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Core i3 550 Integrated graphics chipset or equivalent.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU (2 GHz or greater speed)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: A dedicated GPU (Nvidia or AMD) with at least 750MB of VRAM strongly recommended
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: This content requires the base game Them’s Fightin’ Herds on Steam in order to play.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
